page.title: 12LIVING IN A CARAVAN
page.content: Close to Oakworth Station there is a {caravan site,}called Worth Valley Caravan Site. The caravans are used by people who come on{holiday}to visit {Haworth}and by people who come to the caravan site because their houses are being{renovated.} Many people moving into Oakworth buy{old barns or farms } to renovate and live in. When I moved into Oakworth, my family and I moved into a caravan. There are twelve caravans on the site and one is used as a shower room. It was quite a squash living in a caravan, and when it rained it was boring. We crayoned and played games like Hangman or Snakes and Ladders because there was no room to run about. There was only a small cooker and we ate lots of easy meals like spaghetti rings and fish and chips from the "chippy". I am glad to be living in a house again!
